Topic.Title: Posting images and possibly video....how to?

Posts.EditableText:
I would like to ask for help and the best way is to show screenshots.
Most postings have XML snippets and I'm not that strong in that area yet.
I see some users have screenshots and the odd one has video.
How do I include screenshots in my forum postings? There is nothing mentioned in the Forum Help Guide.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

There are many ways, but here's how I do it:

1\. Upload the screenshot to an external host.  I use GitHub.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/48263117-ad0d9100-e3ea-11e8-935c-dd466a924912.png)

2\. Link to the image in your forum post, like this:  ```![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/48263106-9bc48480-e3ea-11e8-81f2-1252b847b273.png)```


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/48263106-9bc48480-e3ea-11e8-81f2-1252b847b273.png)

---
I think GIFs are the only video files you can display here.  (You would follow the same steps as normal pictures.)
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

There are many ways, but here's how I do it:

1. Upload the screenshot to an external host. I use GitHub.

2. Link to the image in your forum post, like this: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/48263106-9bc48480-e3ea-11e8-81f2-1252b847b273.png)

I think GIFs are the only video files you can display here. (You would follow the same steps as normal pictures.)
